scripts.watch: nodemon -e ts,js -w src -x "tsc; cd dist; node index.js"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -r node_modules_prod dist/node_modules && cp package.json dist/
scripts.package: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -r node_modules_prod dist/node_modules && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && zip -r9 ../test_function_js.zip . && cd ..
